title: He Died And Lives
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

v1: I hear the words of love,
And I have peace with God.
v3: The clouds may go and come,
And storms may sweep my sky;
v4: My joy still ebbs and flows;
But peace with Him remains the same,
v5: His love, not mine, the resting-place,
His truth, not mine, the tie.
v6: Though heaven is now His home;
The mighty stone is rolled away,
v7: The grave of all my woes!
I know the Son of God has come,
I know He died and rose.
v8: I know the throne on which He sits,
I know His truth and love!
